title: Sales Manager
content:
Teads is looking for an exceptional Sales Manager with an entrepreneur mindset based in São Paulo, to execute and drive incremental revenue growth in an exciting territory.
Reporting to the Local Client Partnerships Director, you’ll be responsible for growing new business across media agencies. Naturally, you will have experience bringing in new business.
Your mission will be to:

Identify, pitch, and close sales deals with media agencies and brands
Attend weekly meetings/presentations with media agencies
Achieve quarterly revenue goals
Represent Teads and be a brand ambassador in the online advertising marketplace
Collaborate with Customer Experience and Studio teams to develop campaign strategies
Manage and maintain a healthy individual sales pipeline and achieve sales target
Ensure a high level of client satisfaction to generate renewals and increase incremental revenue

Requirements

Prior digital media sales experience is required, ideally within mobile or video
Previous technology platform experience a huge plus
Deep relationships with contacts at top-tier agencies and advertisers
Understanding of the digital video marketplace
Programmatic knowledge is a big plus
Outstanding communication and presentation skills
Driven, passionate, and an ultimate team player
Reading and writing business English skill / English Business conversation skill

===== ABOUT TEADS ======
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media. As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies.
For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers. Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies, and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries. For more information, visit: www.teads.com
We’re committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
